definition: test point/to carry out trial/pilot scheme

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: For major reforms, we will first experiment with projects and gradually expand to other areas only after gaining useful experience.
sentences.chinese: 重大改革措施坚持先行试点，取得经验后再逐步推开。

sentences.english: Pilot to float interest rates starts at CMB .
sentences.chinese: 央行将在招行实行试点，实施市场浮动利率。

sentences.english: The Hainan example represents the first province-wide spatial planning.
sentences.chinese: 海南省是全国第一个开展省域空间规划的改革试点。

sentences.english: The CSRC would "adjust the size and pace" of flotations while the pilot was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 证监会将在试点期间，调整浮选的规模和节奏。

sentences.english: Each test site can be thought of as an isolated resistor.
sentences.chinese: 可以认为每个测试点都是一个绝缘的电阻器。

sentences.english: We will conduct pilot projects for reforming some collectively owned factories operated by state-owned enterprises and cities.
sentences.chinese: 做好部分城市和国有企业厂办大集体改革试点工作。

sentences.english: We have run the pilot program of settling cross-border trade with RMB, in particular, trade in goods.
sentences.chinese: 我们实现了货物贸易在香港以人民币结算的试点。

sentences.english: Trials to set the allowable number of employees, level of funding and limits for spending for goods within basic expenditures expanded.
sentences.chinese: 扩大基本支出定员定额和实物费用定额试点。

sentences.english: The second part analyses the condition of experimental unit of the system of standing party congress in county and city.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，县市党的代表大会常任制试点情况分析。

sentences.english: She said she's been heartened enough by the results to try more ideas.
sentences.chinese: 她说试点的结果让她颇受鼓舞，准备做更多的尝试。

sentences.english: Over 200 troupes have undergone pilot transformations.
sentences.chinese: 转企改制试点文艺院团已超过200家。

sentences.english: Chongqing Kefa Company is making efforts on cleanliness experimental unit according to Chongqing Finance Affairs Committee.
sentences.chinese: 按重庆市经委要求正在进行清洁生产试点工作。

sentences.english: Second part , Introduce the pilot situation of rural reform of taxation expenses of Jilin Province.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，介绍吉林省农村税费改革试点情况。

sentences.english: Take the lead in Taizhou of Jiangsu Province City pilot compiled an overall land use planning.
sentences.chinese: 率先在江苏省泰州市试点编制土地利用总体规划。

sentences.english: First, to expand the application of the unit crime.
sentences.chinese: 该公司也是第一批试点单位。

sentences.english: All of this begs the question, "What is the point of the test?
sentences.chinese: 大家都很关心的一个问题是，“什么是测试点？

definition: to put into effect/to carry out
to launch/to develop/to unfold/(of an exhibition etc) to open
to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
to bring into/to channel into/to integrate into/to incorporate
to officially launch (a policy, program etc)/to appear on stage/to appear publicly/(of a bar girl) to leave with a client
to implement/to carry out/to put into practice
